execution_plan.description: Find the payment method used by the most customers by counting distinct customers per payment_method_code and returning the top method.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_payment_methods.payment_method_code AS s1__payment_method_code, COUNT(DISTINCT customer_payment_methods.customer_id) AS s1__customer_count FROM customer_payment_methods GROUP BY customer_payment_methods.payment_method_code ORDER BY s1__customer_count DESC LIMIT 1;
